flavor_text_entries.flavor_text:
タマゴを　守るため　オスと　メスは　交代で
巣の　周りを　泳ぎ回り　パトロールする。
タマゴが　かえるまで　ひと月以上　続く。

Seaking is very protective of its eggs. The male and female
will take turns patrolling around their nest and eggs. The
guarding of eggs by these Pokémon goes on for over a month.

Seaking protegge gelosamente le sue uova. Il maschio e
la femmina si danno il cambio attorno alla tana e alle uova.
Le uova vengono sorvegliate per oltre un mese.

Seaking protege sus huevos con uñas y dientes. Macho y
hembra se turnan para vigilar el nido y los huevos. Este
período de protección dura más de un mes en el caso de
estos Pokémon.

Golking gibt sehr viel acht auf seine Brut. Es patrouilliert um
sein Nest und die Eier herum, wobei sich das männliche und
das weibliche Exemplar abwechseln. Das Bewachen der Eier
beschäftigt dieses Pokémon für über einen Monat.

Les Poissoroy font tout pour protéger leurs œufs.
Les mâles et les femelles patrouillent pour surveiller le nid et
les œufs. La garde de ces œufs dure un peu plus d’un mois.

알을 지키기 위해서 수컷과 암컷은 교대로
서식지 주변을 헤엄쳐 다니며 순찰한다.
알이 부화할 때까지 한 달 이상 계속된다.

タマゴを　まもるため　オスと　メスは　こうたいで
すの　まわりを　およぎまわり　パトロールする。
タマゴが　かえるまで　ひとつきいじょう　つづく。

秋に　なると　メスに　プロポーズする　ために
川底で　踊る　オスを　 ることが　できる。
体の　色が　最も　美しい　季節。

In the autumn, Seaking males can be seen performing
courtship dances in riverbeds to woo females. During this
season, this Pokémon’s body coloration is at its most beautiful.

In autunno, i Seaking maschio sono soliti corteggiare le
femmine con particolari danze rituali. In questa stagione il
corpo di questi Pokémon assume una colorazione particolare.

En otoño, se ven ejemplares de Seaking macho danzando en
las riberas de los ríos para cortejar a las hembras. En esta
época, la coloración de este Pokémon alcanza sus niveles
máximos de belleza.

Im Herbst kann man männliche Golking dabei beobachten,
wie sie Balztänze in Flussbetten aufführen, um die weiblichen
Exemplare zu beeindrucken. Während dieser Zeit ist die Farbe
dieser Pokémon am schönsten.

En automne, on peut voir les Poissoroy mâles effectuer des
danses nuptiales dans les rivières pour plaire aux femelles.
C’est pendant cette saison que le corps de ce Pokémon
prend ses plus belles couleurs.

가을이 되면 암컷에게 프러포즈하기 위해
강바닥에서 춤추는 수컷을 볼 수 있다.
몸의 색이 가장 아름다운 계절이다.

あきに　なると　メスに　プロポーズする　ために
かわぞこで　おどる　オスを　 ることが　できる。
からだの　いろが　もっとも　うつくしい　きせつ。

頭の　ツノで　川底にある
岩を　くり抜いて　巣を　作る。
タマゴを　命がけで　守る。

It makes its nest by hollowing out boulders in
streams with its horn. It defends its eggs with
its life.

Con il suo corno, perfora le rocce sul letto dei fiumi
per farsi il nido. Difende le uova a costo della vita.

Hace su nido en los agujeros que cava con el cuerno.
Defiende sus huevos con su vida.

Es baut Nester, indem es Steine im Fluss mit seinem
Horn aushöhlt. Es verteidigt seine Eier mit dem Leben.

Il niche dans des rochers du ruisseau qu’il évide
avec sa corne. Il donnerait sa vie pour ses Œufs.

머리의 뿔로 강바닥에 있는
돌을 파내어 둥지를 만든다.
알을 목숨 걸고 지킨다.

あたまの　ツノで　かわぞこにある
いわを　くりぬいて　すを　つくる。
タマゴを　いのちがけで　まもる。

秋が　くると　産卵のために
流れに　逆らって　力強く
川を　泳ぐ　姿が　みられる。

In the autumn spawning season, they can be seen
swimming powerfully up rivers and creeks.

In autunno, quando si riproduce, può essere visto
risalire impetuoso fiumi e torrenti.

En otoño, cuando se reproducen, se les puede ver
nadando con energía por ríos y arroyos.

Im Herbst, zur Paarungszeit, sieht man diese
Pokémon kraftvoll Bäche und Flüsse hinaufschwimmen.

Pendant la saison des amours, on peut le voir nager
dans les rivières et les lacs.

가을이 오면 산란을 위해
힘차게 강물을 거슬러 올라가며
헤엄치는 모습을 볼 수 있다.

あきが　くると　さんらんの　ために
ながれに　さからって　ちからづよく
かわを　およぐ　すがたが　みられる。

In autumn, its body becomes more
fatty in preparing to propose to a
mate. It takes on beautiful colors.

In autumn, its body becomes more
fatty in preparing to propose to a
mate. It takes on beautiful colors.

In autumn, its body becomes more
fatty in preparing to propose to a
mate. It takes on beautiful colors.

En automne, à la saison des amours,
il fait des réserves de graisse et
arbore des couleurs chatoyantes.

In autumn, its body becomes more
fatty in preparing to propose to a
mate. It takes on beautiful colors.

En automne, à la saison des amours,
il fait des réserves de graisse et
arbore des couleurs chatoyantes.

Using its horn, it bores holes in
riverbed boulders, making nests to
prevent its eggs from washing away.

During spawning season, SEAKING
gather from all over, causing rivers to
appear a brilliant red.

In autumn, its body becomes more
fatty in preparing to propose to a
mate. It takes on beautiful colors.

To protect its family, it will fight
with its drill-sharp horn. It lives
in hollowed rocks in streams.

It makes its nest by hollowing out
boulders in streams with its horn.
It defends its eggs with its life.

In the autumn spawning season, they can
be seen swimming powerfully up rivers and
creeks.

The horn on its head is sharp like a
drill. It bores a hole in a boulder to
make its nest.

It punches holes in boulders on stream­
beds. This is a clever innovation that
prevents its eggs from being attacked or
washed away by the current.

SEAKING is very protective of its eggs.
The male and female will take turns
patrolling around their nest and eggs. The guarding of eggs by these POKéMON
goes on for over a month.

In the autumn, SEAKING males can be
seen performing courtship dances in
riverbeds to woo females. During this season, this POKéMON’s body
coloration is at its most beautiful.

When autumn comes,
the males patrol
the area around their nests in
order to protect
their offspring.

Using its horn, it
bores holes in
riverbed boulders, making nests to
prevent its eggs
from washing away.

During spawning
season, SEAKING
gather from all over, coloring
the rivers a
brilliant red.

It is the male's
job to make a
nest by carving out boulders in a
stream using the
horn on its head.

In the autumn
spawning season,
they can be seen swimming power­
fully up rivers
and creeks.

In the autumn
spawning season,
they can be seen swimming power­
fully up rivers
and creeks.
